price: 124 lorsque l’un des leurs, Houd, leur dit : « Ne craignez-vous pas le Seigneur ?
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُمۡ أَخُوهُمۡ هُودٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: idh qāla lahum akhūhum hūdun alā tattaqūna
